Simple Harmonic Oscillator
    - Setup parameters
    - Define initial conditions
    - Initialize arrays to store time, position, and velocity
    - Initial values (position and velocity)
    - Verlet integration
    - Plot

Projectile Motion with Air Resistance
    - Define constants
    - Define initial conditions
    - Initialize arrays to store time, position, and velocity
    - Initial Values (x, y, vx, and vy)
    - Euler method to solve motion with drag
    - Plotting the trajectory

Blackbody Radiation
    - Constants
    - Function for Planck's Law
    - Wavelength range (in meters)
    - Temperatures
    - Plot radiation intensity for different temperature

Data Analysis of Experimental Results (with Pandas)
    - Load experimental data
    - Define the model function (e.g., quadratic)
    - Fit the data to a quadratic function
    - Generate fitted data for plotting
    - Plot original data and fitted curve

2D Heat Diffusion
    - Parameters
    - Initialize temperature grid
    - Heat diffusion simulation
    - Plot heatmap

2D Random Walk
    - Parameters
    - Function to perform random walk
    - Simulate random walks
    - Average displacement
    - Plot random walk

Fourier Series of a Square Wave
    - Fourier series approximation of a square wave
    - Parameters
    - Plot Fourier approximations

Monte Carlo Simulation of Pi
    - Parameters
    - Generate random points in the unit square
    - Check if the points are inside the quarter circle
    - Estimate Pi
    - Print the result
    - Plot the points
